author: Ian
description: This is the parse.json file for the novel engine.

h_data: return $('.weui-cell.favorite').map((index, element) => {const title = $(element).find('.weui-flex__item').first().text();const author = $(element).find('.type span').first().text();const imgUrl = $(element).find('.cover img').attr('src');const description = $(element).find('.desc span').text();const score = $(element).find('.score').text();const bookUrl = $(element).find('a').attr('href');return {title,author,imgUrl,description,score,bookUrl,};}).get();

const similiarBooks = [];$('.weui-flex.books-list .weui-flex__item').each((index, element) => {similiarBooks.push({title: $(element).find('h3').text().trim(),bookUrl: $(element).find('a').attr('href'),author: '',description: '', imgUrl: $(element).find('img').attr('src'),score: $(element).find('.score').text().trim()});});return {name: 'kpkpo',title: $('.card .book-info .info h3').text().trim(),author: $('.upload').text().replace(' è‘—', '').trim(),description: $('.desc').text().trim(), imgUrl: $('.cover img').attr('src'), score: $('.card .book-info .score-wrap .score').text().trim(), chapterUrl: $('.catalog .chapter a').attr('href'),similiarBooks: similiarBooks};

const chapters = [];var chapter_id = 0;$('.child-title li a').each((index, element) => {const title = $(element).text().trim();const href = $(element).attr('href');chapters.push({id: chapter_id,title: title,url: href});chapter_id++;});const result = {name: 'kpkpo',chapters: chapters};return result;
const content = $('article.js-article').text().trim();const title = $('h4.title').text().trim();const data = {name: 'kpkpo',title: title,content: content};return data;

const recommendations = [];$('.weui-cell').each((index, element) => {const title = $(element).find('h3').text().trim();const bookUrl = $(element).find('a').attr('href');const author = $(element).find('.author').text().trim();const description = $(element).find('.desc').text().trim();const imgUrl = $(element).find('img').attr('src');const score = $(element).find('.score').text().trim();if (title && bookUrl) {recommendations.push({title,bookUrl,author,description,imgUrl,score,});}});const data = {name: 'kpkpo',recommendations};return data;
